ai-patthana15.88:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.88:0.3_0: Standing on the past, the supported by the past.
ai-patthana15.88:1.1_0: Passing in the past, future, or present.
ai-patthana15.88:1.1_2: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
ai-patthana15.88:2.1_2: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
ai-patthana15.88:3.1_0: Because of the presenting, the support is not for the arising of thought.
ai-patthana15.88:3.1_1: Nor do you become dependently originated on the thought that arises dependent on the arising of thought.
ai-patthana15.88:3.1_2: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
